long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better privacy and security on the internet.
Do you think organisations collect and store too much data about you, often without your consent?
Are you worried how well they look after your data or what happens if they are hacked?
Have you ever received an email and wondered how they got hold of your email address?
Have you wanted to click an unsubscribe button but wondered whether they will actually remove your personal details?
Are you concerned that Ransomware attacks are rising and that email is one of the most common ways you can be targeted?
Have you ever received a convincing email that LOOKED like it came from a real company and nearly clicked on a link within?
Then this is the extension for you.
